about.title: About
about.description: At Doer, we mentor early-career professionals—software developers, designers, project managers, and QA specialists—through real projects for free, helping them grow their skills and confidence to advance in their careers.

1.title: Team Collaboration
1.description: As a doer, you will join a team working on real projects, gaining hands-on experience and contributing to impactful work.

2.title: Upskilling Tech Profession
2.description: As a doer, you'll receive expert mentorship to enhance your skills and become a top candidate for leading companies.

3.title: Community Opportunities
3.description: As a doer, you will dive into a dynamic tech community that unlocks exciting growth and career opportunities.

1.name: Tornike Ramazashvili
1.bio: A passionate developer with over 10 years of experience in web technologies.

2.name: Mariam Getsadze
2.bio: Skilled in product management with a strong background in UX/UI design.

3.name: Luka Chubinidze
3.bio: Expert in machine learning and data analysis with a passion for turning data into actionable insights.

4.name: Irakli Pankvelashvili
4.bio: Skilled in product management with a strong background in UX/UI design.

5.name: Nutsa Chichilidze
5.bio: Expert in machine learning and data analysis with a passion for turning data into actionable insights.

registration.title: Registration
registration.subtitle: Take your step and become a doer!

1.title: Register
1.description: Fill out the form on the right side and wait for our message.

2.title: Interview
2.description: The first 60 registrants will be invited for an individual interview.

3.title: Task
3.description: Complete an assigned task to demonstrate your skills.

4.title: Join
4.description: From the 60 interviewed, only 30 will be selected for the first intake.
